Explanation: The partially correct code fails when the word is at the end of the string and the length of the word is more than 3. So, the test cases are designed to cover various scenarios including the word at the beginning, middle, end of the string and the word length varying from 1 to more than 3. Based on the feedback, test case 6 and 11 are modified to ensure the word is not at the end of the string.
